name: Gift Pack for Woocommerce
author: IT Path Solutions

sections.description:
Let customers add gift packing/wrapping to individual products from product pages. choose your own Gift Pack design directly from the product page with message for Gift Pack. set your own price for gift pack for entire site or even set custom price for each product.

Features

  • Allow customers add gift wrapping to individual products from product page
  • Add global price for gift pack for all products
  • Add different price for individual product
  • Enable / Disable gift wrapping option for specific product category from setting page
  • Allow customer to choose amazing Gift pack layout from product page
  • Write your own Greeting message to Gift Pack
  • Works with both simple & variable products
  • Enable / Disable Gift Pack Note
  • Enable / Disable Gift Pack Images
  • Allow site owner to add unlimited layout Or gift pack images for Gift Packs
  • Gift Pack details to customer orders emails
  • Easy to use & customize
  • Fully Compatible with WPML
  • Lightbox & Popup for Giftpack images
  • Option to Enable/Disable Giftpack images

Support

Gift Pack for Woocommerce is developed and supported by IT Path Solutions. If you don’t find an answer of your Query/Doubt/Problem in FAQs or Support forum, feel free to get in touch with us. Click here

Gift Pack for Woocommerce needs your support WordPress thrives on community. And, you are a part of community. So, we kindly request you to support Gift Pack for Woocommerce. and, there are many ways to support, both technical and non-technical.

Different ways to support

  • Report Technical Issues: While developing Gift Pack for Woocommerce, we took utmost care to make sure that we commit bug-free plugin. However, if any issues has been slipped in and you found it, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Report Documentation Glitches: Documentation is a crucial part of WordPress. So, we take it seriously. If you have noticed any glitches in documentation of Gift Pack for Woocommerce, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Provide Suggestions: If you have any suggestions for Gift Pack for Woocommerce, we would be grateful if you share it with us. Click here to submit a suggestion.

  • Help in Support forum: Being an active WordPress Community member, you can answer to others’ queries on Support forum. Please visit Support forum of Gift Pack for Woocommerce.

  • Submit Translations: Help localize, submit translations in your language for Gift Pack for Woocommerce on WP translate.

Don’t forget to check out our other plugins developed by IT Path Solutions WordPress Gems

Services And Support

We are committed to top-notch Community and Customer support because we know if you have problem with video slider, you need a solution as soon as possible.

Our Other Plugins

  1. Contact Form to Any API:Contact form 7 to Any API is most powerful plugin to send cf7 data to any third party services. It can be use to send data to CRM Or any REST API. Easy to use and User friendly settings

  2. Any Post Slider: Any Post Slider is the most powerful WordPress plugin to create sliders. Fully responsive and works with any WordPress theme. To create amazing sliders in minimum time and can be run in any WordPress theme.

  3. SCSS WP Editor: SCSS WP Editor will provide you to add SCSS from your WordPress admin. You just need to add your SCSS and save it. The plugin will Automatically compile the SCSS to CSS with help of SCSSPHP.

  4. Manifold Google Maps: The most effortless, valuable and effective google map plugin! Effectively make a boundless number of Google Maps and markers.

  5. Advanced Images Gallery With Lightbox: Advanced Images Gallery With Lightbox is the leading plugin for building responsive galleries with Fancy box & Different Layouts

  6. Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets: Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets is a simple, easy and fully-customizable WordPress plugin used to add popup on fixed position like bottom left, bottom right, left side or right side , top left side & top right side with User friendly Settings.

  7. Any CPT Listing Block: Any Post/CPT Listing allows you to add latest posts or custom posts to your website as section with Gutenberg builder. Display settings allows you to select different style from list or gird view with other settings like limiting of number of posts on front.

  8. Easy Donation for Woocommerce: Easy Donation for Woocommerce Allow customers to add Donation directly from WooCommerce checkout page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload gift-pack-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find Gift Pack for WooCommerce in your WordPress admin screen.
sections.faq:
Can we use custom gift wrap image ?

Yes & even you can upload your own gift pack image as a gift wrapper.

Can we set global price for all products ?

Yes, you can set global price for all products from settings.

Can we set different price for individual product ?

Yes, you can set custom price for different product.

Can i change predefined labels and placeholders ?

Yes all labels and placeholders texts can be manage from settings

Is it compatible with all types of premium and free theme ?

Yes
sections.changelog:
1.1.7

  • Fix: Address the issue where decimal values cause incorrect pricing calculations.

1.1.6

  • Improvement – Compatible with Xstore theme

1.1.5

  • Improvement – Compatible with latest WordPress version 6.5

1.1.4

  • New – Option to add lightbox for Giftpack images
  • Fix – Other small fixes and updates

1.1.3

  • Fix – WPML fixes for Global price

1.1.2

  • Fix – Global price issue for some users

1.1.1

  • Improvement – Compatible with WPML

1.1.0

  • Improvement – Compatible with latest WordPress version 6.3

1.0.9

  • Fix – Price field to support Decimal value in setting page

1.0.8

  • Enhancement – Compatibility updated for WordPress 6.2

1.0.7

  • Fixed – CSS & JS Issues for Quick view

1.0.6

  • Fixed – gift pack option saving issue fixed for some users
  • Improvement – gift pack option code optmization and update

1.0.5

  • Fixed – Variation product price update
  • New – Enable / Disable gift wrapping option for specific category
  • Improvement – JS Optimization

1.0.4

  • Fixed – Sale Price Issue for Simple Product
  • Improvement – JS Optimization
  • Improvement – variable products to display total on product page
  • Improvement – UI updates
  • Improvement – Currency options update

1.0.3

  • New – Added Enable/Disable gift pack images

1.0.2

  • New – Added Enable/Disable gift pack note option

1.0.1

  • Improvement – Added Settings Link & Added Validation in Gift Pack Note

1.0.0

  • Initial Commit
